events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to incorrect item delivery reported by the customer.
Customer support agent Emily has been assigned to handle this refund request.
Hello, I’m Emily from customer support. I’m here to help you with your refund request for the incorrect item received.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process the refund?
Thanks for replying. My order number is 987654321, and I’ve attached a photo showing the wrong product that was sent.
We have reviewed your photo and order. We will issue a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Thank you for handling this quickly. I appreciate the prompt refund and your clear communication.
The refund process has been completed successfully and the case is now resolved.
We are following up to ensure you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
The case has been formally closed as the refund was confirmed and no further issues were reported by the customer.
